channel.title: Travel on Chitharanjan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Chitharanjan's Blog

item.title: The Kasol Affair
item.description: It’s been four months since my first trip to Kasol. Looking back, I don’t regret not having kept an account of how I spent my time there. There’s a certain infectious quality about the relaxed air at Kasol. Once you’re there, enjoy the cool weather, eat the good food, live at the cheap hotels and meet the strange people. Of course there’s a lot else to do, but keeping a journal of my adventures was never a priority.
